text:
@neal_katyal The post COVID-19 world (a long time from now) will have thousands, possibly tens of thousands, of SURVIVORS that will have pre-existing conditions. Compromised lungs, weakened immune systems, physical complications etc.
It has always be about loss of revenue for Ins companies.

entity.name: Neal Katyal
entity.description: an American lawyer and partner at Hogan Lovells, as well as Paul and Patricia Saunders Professor of National Security Law at Georgetown University Law Center.
